body.p: Adding F5 Network products to your deployment can provide critical application delivery services consistently across the data center, private cloud, and public cloud. This allows hybrid users to experience the availability and performance they expect.

F5 Networks BIG-IP product family includes purpose-built hardware, software, and virtualized solutions. Depending on the appliance you use, one or more BIG-IP modules can be added to get the functionality your deployment requires.
Creating an application centered strategy using F5 BIG-IP is supported in all of the following scenarios:

ul.li: migrating and re-architecting existing applications to a public cloud IbaaS (load balancing as a service) provider
moving to Software as a Service (SaaS)
deploying applications in a hybrid environment

body.note: Keep in mind that flexible licensing options are available, based on where you want to deploy.

section.title: Supported Operations
section.p: The following operations have been tested and verified to work on a Helion OpenStack Deployment integrated with F5 BIGIP networks.

row.entry: Get lbaas v2 agent hosting a loadbalancer
LBaaS v2 Delete a given healthmonitor
LBaaS v2 List healthmonitors that belong to a given tenant
LBaaS v2 Show information of a given healthmonitor
LBaaS v2 Update a given healthmonitor
LBaaS v2 Delete a given listener
LBaaS v2 List listeners that belong to a given tenant
LBaaS v2 Show information of a given listener
LBaaS v2 Update a given listener
LBaaS v2 Delete a given loadbalancer
LBaaS v2 List loadbalancers that belong to a given tenant
List the loadbalancers on a loadbalancer v2 agent
LBaaS v2 Show information of a given loadbalancer
LBaaS v2 Update a given loadbalancer
LBaaS v2 Delete a given member
LBaaS v2 List members that belong to a given tenant
LBaaS v2 Show information of a given member
LBaaS v2 Update a given member
LBaaS v2 Delete a given pool
LBaaS v2 List pools that belong to a given tenant
LBaaS v2 Show information of a given pool.
LBaaS v2 Update a given pool

body.p: To integrate F5 BIG-IP features into your OpenStack deployment:

li.xref: Install the F5 Driver and Agent
